title: Volatile fatty acid extraction from fermentation broth using a hydrophobic ionic liquid and in situ enzymatic esterification
content:

Ramkrishna Singh, Nikhil Kumar, Prathap Parameswaran, Blake A. Simmons, Kenneth Sale, Ning Sun
The selected hydrophobic ionic liquid is a promising solvent for both extraction and esterification of volatile fatty acids (VFAs) from fermentation broth. The extraction and esterification efficiency is higher for longer chain VFAs.
